head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VOORHEES, FLORENCE E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VOORHEES, FLORENCE E.

block.p: VOORHEES-Florence E. Of Jersey City, New Jersey on Saturday, September 30, 2000. Loving daughter of the late Mr. and Mrs. John J. Voorhees, Jr. and step daughter of Emma Louise Tompkins Voorhees. Cremation services were held privately. For information McLaughlin Funeral Home, 625 Pavonia Ave, Jersey City, NJ 07306. There will be no visiting at the funeral home. Contributions in Florence Voorhees' memory may be made to the Boys and Girls Club of Hudson County.

Contributions in Florence Voorhees' memory may be made to the Boys and Girls Club of Hudson County.
